alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 10:49AM CDT until May 09 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Missouri River at Hermann. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Missouri... Missouri River near Chamois. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Missouri River at Washington. Missouri River at St. Charles. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Missouri River at St. Charles. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, The right bank downstream overflows, flooding agricultural bottomland. Near this stage, Missouri Route H at Island Road will be closed in both directions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 25.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM CDT Saturday was 26.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 19.0 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 1 pm Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Missouri River St. Charles 25.0 25.9 23.2 22.2 21.3 20.1 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
